summary: This document is a correspondence from Jeffrey Epstein requesting the removal of Bruce Galloway as a trading agent for the Southern Financial LLC account. It includes details about the account and the request for action to be taken by TD Ameritrade.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is mentioned as the account holder for Southern Financial LLC.

persons.context: Bruce Galloway is referenced as the trading agent being removed from the account.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is the account holder who employed Bruce Galloway as a trading agent.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B-3 St Thomas, USVI 00802
keyFacts: The document is a request to TD Ameritrade to remove Bruce Galloway as a trading agent.
The request was made by Jeffrey Epstein on February 21, 2019.
Richard Kahn is identified as the account holder for Southern Financial LLC.
The correspondence is marked as confidential.
